sentence: Stayed one night on a business trip because it was near my event and it was reasonably priced for this area
However when we reached our room it was spacious and quiet
perfect for a langer stay at la jola
Definitely would stay here again on my next La Jola trip
Staff were very pleasant and helpful
Comfortable clean simple acomodation in pricey La Jola
My wife and I stayed for 9 days and had a great time in San Diego and the surrounding area
The rooms are clean the pool is small but perfect for kids and the hot tub is lovely
The location is very good and would be great if it was a half mile up the road but I would not let that keep me from staying here again
Very close to beautiful beaches and across from great Mexican restaurant
In addition the rooms are old and musty and currently can not be compared to the equivalent value when paying the same price at a larger chain
did not even offer a discount after having something like this happen
Only thing missing from room was a luggage stand
There were a few other things that I did not like eg They did not refill the shower gel and and shampoo
The hanging sliding door comes off the rail if you are not careful
Could hear some getting ready music from the next room one morning
There was no cups or shampoo in the room
As I was leaving I saw they had bikes available you might want to check into that
We explained for almost 10mins and she just said ‘ I still have to charge you 10

No parking very weird bad smell inside of the shower bathroom doors are farm doors which were not put on correctly and do not stay closed unles you put something there to hold the door closed so no real privacy I booked in advance requested extra towels no extra towels in my room when I went to the office to ask for some there were only two available not even enough for in the amount of guests I have with me I called them to ask for a late check out and they told me they could give me 30 minutes that would be all that they could do for me that I could use the parking lot which there was n’t even a place to park in the first place
